text: Mercedes Bentso, full name Linda-Maria Roine, is a Finnish rapper.[Rapper Mercedes Bentso clashed with an association working against school bullying] Rap-artisti Mercedes Bentso joutui napit vastakkain koulukiusaamista vastaan toimivan yhdistyksen kanssa. Yle.fi. Retrieved 9 July 2021 She has been active as a rapper since 2012, and her genre is Gangsta rap.[Documentary project: Never again – rapper Mercedes Bentson's story] Dokumenttiprojekti: Ei koskaan enää – rap-artisti Mercedes Bentson rehellinen tarina. Yle.fi. Retrieved 9 July 2021 Her songs tell about drug use in her past, and about her being a victim of violence. The documentary film Never Again (from 2018), about Roine, has Aino Sun as film director.
